title: seek3r
author: seek3r
content: Hi all,since my post here I have been contacted several times in a short time via DM. This way I would like to try to offer the gold bar of Alpencoin as transparent as possible.You can post offers here or via DM. I will ask each potential buyer if I may post their offer here (either anonymously or even with forum name).It is #22 which was funded with 0.01 BTC by Alpencoin.If this procedure doesn't go quite right or violates against any rules, I will start a new auction with said item if necessary.

comments.author: DirtyBirdE
comments.body: Would bid if there was an auction

comments.author: seek3r
comments.body: Quote from: JanEmil on December 04, 2022, 07:49:37 PMAuction maybe.Quote from: MrMojoRising26 on December 04, 2022, 08:15:15 PMan auction would be bestQuote from: DirtyBirdE on December 04, 2022, 08:21:55 PMWould bid if there was an auction Done.Click here to go to the desired auctionGood luck to everyone. If there are any questions you can still ask here or via DM.
